name: Knighty Night
description:
A Charming World of Adventure and Mystery
Embark on a perilous journey through dungeons, toxic sewers, haunted graveyards, and a ghastly cathedral. Pesky ghosts will try to ruin your day but don’t be afraid... These ghosts are more charming than spooky!Be the Knightiest Knight
Play as the determined knight and defeat foes with your trusty sword. Discover secrets and unravel the knight's story.Unique Areas
Your journey will take you through 12 levels with 4 themes. You will face intriguing puzzles, various enemies, and challenging bosses.
Master your sword and your wits to survive the night!Challenging Bosses
Face challenging, quirky bosses! Take down the 9 unique bosses and emerge from the darkness!

Simple and Engaging Combat
Wield your sword in combat and strike back ghosts that try to face you. Positioning and timing are key to survive the night!
